reviews.review:
[h1]Great game[/h1]
Really fun game, so much more gameplay than the first game. Just in case you didn't realise, definitely play Portal [b]before[/b] playing Portal 2 if you're going for story or whatever

Cara... é portal 2, lançado em 2011 e revolucionando o mercado dos video games, uma referencia de coop e puzzle game, não existe um jeito simples de definir esse jogo, incrível parece pouco, com uma experiencia coop insuperável o único jeito de definir é... PORTAL 2
Tout est génial, l'histoire, la narration, le gameplay, bref, Must Have pour votre bibliothèque Steam

It's just freaking amazing.
I can't believe i didn't play it earlier. I really hope for part 3, and more GLaDOS

orignally beat this on ps3, just recently got it on computer. this game is a masterpiece. the soundtrack is absolutely incredible and this is one of my favorite games of all time. if you have 10$ to spare and haven't played this then buy this game. 10/10 would rip a hole in spacetime again
Portal 2 is simply the original game "Portal" by Valve but it is on source engine 2 so it is more awesomer
It's a very good game! I reccommend it!

Habe seit langen nicht mehr so ein geniales, witziges , und packened spiel gezockt .... würde mich über einen 3ten teil mega freuen :D ... man merkt das die macher von spiel richtig bock hatten .. immer so weiter ... wil ja nicht spoilern, aber einmal angefangen kann man nicht mehr aufhören :) .
绝对的佳作，不愧是STEAM护航作
Игра топ, классная головоломка с сюжеткой)
son kisimlari kafa acici guzel bir oyun
One of a kind, especially for its time. Considerable changes since the previous game
esta guapo el jugo y tal pero al final es una ralladura mental
the story is significantly better than the first game's
I had a lot of fun playing the co op with my friends. I also think that the writing is amazing and very funny.
Где торт? Ааааа он ложь, не так ведь?
No lo termine todavía perdón amigo
História magnífica, puzzles excelentes e personagens interessantes.
it is a realy good and fun game and i think that anyone would like it
a game every gamer has to play
oyun cidden cok iyi bulmaca acısından olsun bolum tasarımlarından olsun kessinlikle almanızı tavsiye ederim
its got the story, its got the easy and hard levels, its got it all.

Esse jogo é meio antigo mas mesmo comprando agora ainda acho ele muito legal e divertido, joguei algumas fazes com um amigo meu e não me arrependo de ter comprado! ele tem uns puzzles bem complicados até, faz com que você e quem você está jogando pensarem bastante juntos.
Kafa yormalık güzel bir oyun 2 kisilik ve tek kisilik oynayabiliyorsunuz sistem istemeyen bir oyun ve ucuz ama bulmacalı bir oyun olduğu icin kafanız ağrıyabilir
Portal 1 is better. Portal 2 is really good, but I think it is a bit dragged in the mid game.
It's too dark in many places, and the male voice actor spoils the atmosphere. Also the computer is inappropriately obnoxious. I don't want my kids worrying about their body image, for example.
이 게임을 만든 사람은 천재가 맞다
Без интернета не скачивается... Да и по моему портал слишком дорогой 0/10

Отличная игра головоломка с хорошей графикой. И её есть за что похвалить в частности за сюжет. Больше всего мне понравилась озвучка она координально отличается от первой части. Отличные шутки от гладос отлично вписались а сетинг. Кооператив тоже не разочаровал. 9 из 10.

Игра топ только я задалбался думать
Excellent, aussi bien seul qu'en coop.
是一款神作，是真正的神作，可惜v社太懒了，有生之年能出三就好了（大概不能）

This was indeed a great game.  There is nothing to complain about.  I will never stop playing this and the original Portal.  It is sad that Valve saw no way to produce another chapter in this great game.  I only hope that others get to enjoy it as much as I have and still do.
Прохожу игру уже в 5 раз и каждый раз пытаюсь пройти камеры как то по новому или как спидранер
No, please! I don't wan't to race anymore!

In some ways I got a bit bored with how long it was - so many puzzles! But honestly it's hardly a criticism. Portal 1 was far too short and had to be packaged with other games. This one is way longer and actually feels like a full, polished game, and there are SO many puzzles.

But the real factor in my recommendation comes from Stephen Merchant, who made me chuckle from start to finish. Inspired choice for voice actor.
Головоломки классные, сюжет супер. 12 ГЛАДос из 10

i did enjoy this ten year old puzzle game but now it's old and sadly it will get old on you but it still makes the mind work very hard but it will get very old the more you'd do it it had a good run but now it's over for it i'v found better games to take Portal 2's place even the 1st ones place since there both old and Portal 1 is harder then Portal 2 and normally it's the other way around normally first ones easier then the second one but with Portal it's the 1st ones harder then the 2nd one now first i was stuck on a level on the second one but got through it so it did get easy after that then got old sadly...  It's not getting deleted just doing it once in a blue moon that's it since it gets old so i'll do it once in a blue moon and with me that is either i'll do it once in awhile or i'm all done with Portal 2 first it does start out fun but then it will get even older then it did before.... and more into Farming Simulators and City Sweeper clean it fast then with Portal 2 since Portal also has had it's days and those have ended more i'd do it more its fun would drain out of it well now it has no more fun even though it's a strategy puzzle game it had fun love Wheatley it was sad when he turned then the end when GLADOS got very very very mean then suddenly got all nice and sweet and she was like just go get out of aperture basically.....  And she's the type of AI that's first all nice and sweet then acts like those AIs on those old shows where the AI took over the world and killed everyone so actually her being all nice and sweet is fake since those AIs could get very mean and vicious and kill everyone and take over the world like in the old shows
I did not get killed in the part where he kills you. I am upset. Still great game though
